description: ELECOM LAN routers (WRH-733GBK firmware v1.02.9 and prior and WRH-733GWH firmware v1.02.9 and prior) allows a network-adjacent attacker with an administrator privilege to execute arbitrary OS commands via unspecified vectors.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: WRH-733GBK firmware v1.02.9 and prior and WRH-733GWH firmware v1.02.9 and prior
